5.2. Scenario for package building from repo¶

Scenario for building package from repo and publishing is as an artifact

fuel_ci.scenarios.build_package.build(objects)[source]¶

Default stage to execute.

Parameters:objects – dict of objects loaded from YAML

Includes steps:

  • Clone first repository specified in objects (fuel_ci.objects.repo.Repository.clone())
  • Build a package from repository (fuel_ci.objects.package.Package.build())
  • Transform package into a packed artifact (fuel_ci.objects.artifact.Artifact)
  • Publish artifact in storage specified in objects (fuel_ci.objects.artifact_storage.ArtifactStorage.publish_artifact())
